title.rendered: TTE & Danfoss host interactive customer event

content.rendered: TTE Trading along with partners Danfoss hosted an interactive customer event showcasing the capabilities of the enhanced VLT HVAC Drives. The frequency converters from Danfoss, endorsed by the World Alliance for Efficient Solutions are known for their rock-solid reliability, low total cost of ownership and their ability to withstand extreme climate conditions. Key members from Danfoss, Jai Masand, Business Development – Drives: Projects & Solutions, Sohaib Sulaiman, Area Sales Manager – Turkey, Middle East & Africa and Khurram Shazab, Area Sales Manager – UAE, along with Roshan Samuel, Associate Vice President – Trading Division at Technical & Trading Est. co-hosted the event.
